sourcesContent:
import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import useFetch from "./useFetch"; const BorderCountry = () => { const {code}=useParams(); const {data, error, isLoding}=useFetch(`https://restcountries.com/v2/alpha/${code}`); return (
{isLoding &&
Data is loading
} {error &&
{error}
} {data &&
{data.name}
Native Name: {data.nativeName} Top Level Domaine: {data.topLevelDomain} Population: {data.population.toLocaleString('en-US')} Currencies: {data.currencies.map(currency=>(currency.name))} Region: {data.region} Languages: {data.languages.map(language=>(language.name+', '))} Sub Region: {data.subregion} Capital: {data.capital}
Border Countries:
{ data.borders.map((b,idx)=>( {b} )) }
}
); } export default BorderCountry;
